reviewText: the only negative thing about this DVD is all the advertising in the beginning, that can be skipped over but is bothersome.It has the option to play once and go back to the main menu, or to play continuously, which I love. It is like the TV show, but it's longer. It has a good balance of Barney music and sing along, and interactive kids learning. I really like it and my grandson loves it. He doesn't even want Elmo anymore.
summary: 2 1/2 year old loves it and it's a good buy.
Title: Barney: The Best of Barney

reviewText: Given to a child who ask for this as a Christmas gift.  Our Christmas Tree Angel gifts are for those who have a parent in prison.
Title: Barney: The Best of Barney

reviewText: My son loves this episode of Barney and even my husband and I enjoy the music and dancing!  We just make it a family thing
Title: Barney: The Best of Barney

reviewText: I got the DVD for my son when we went away, to keep him entertained during four hour plane ride. He didn't care for it on the plane, but once we got home, all he was saying is "barney, barney" (and he doesn't speak English). He loves the songs and dances to it.
Title: Barney: The Best of Barney

reviewText: Barney has been coming into our homes for many years and this Dvd sums up all the best from all the years and its a great learning experience that your children will be sure to love!!
Title: Barney: The Best of Barney
